Attribute.Name: PriorityDedicatedLocation
Attribute.Description: Determines the priority of a location that is dedicated to the inventory for which the location is being considered for put away.The default priority value for an dedicated location is 2.

Attribute.Name: PriorityEmptyLocation
Attribute.Description: Determines the priority of an Empty Location while considering location for put away. The default priority value for an empty location is 1.

Attribute.Name: PrioritySameReceipt
Attribute.Description: Determines the priority of a location having the inventory belonging to the same Receipt as inventory for which the location is being considered for put away. The default priority value for the same receipt is 1.

Attribute.Name: PrioritySameSKU
Attribute.Description: Determines the priority of a location having the same SKU as inventory for which the location is being considered for put away. The default priority value for the same SKU is 3.
